SEARCH
Package br.dev.rplus.cup.os

Class OperatingSystem

java.lang.Object
br.dev.rplus.cup.os.OperatingSystem
public final class OperatingSystem extends Object
Utility class for detecting and interacting with the operating system properties of the host environment.

    • isWindows

      public static boolean isWindows()
      Checks if the current OS is Windows.
      Returns:
      true if Windows, false otherwise.

    • isLinux

      public static boolean isLinux()
      Checks if the current OS is Linux.
      Returns:
      true if Linux, false otherwise.

    • isMac

      public static boolean isMac()
      Checks if the current OS is macOS.
      Returns:
      true if macOS, false otherwise.

    • isChromeOs

      public static boolean isChromeOs()
      Checks if the current OS is Chrome OS.
      Returns:
      true if Chrome OS, false otherwise.

    • isUnix

      public static boolean isUnix()
      Checks if the current OS is a Unix-based system (Linux or macOS).
      Returns:
      true if Unix-based, false otherwise.

    • isX64

      public static boolean isX64()
      Checks if the system architecture is 64-bit.
      Returns:
      true if x64, false otherwise.

    • isX86

      public static boolean isX86()
      Checks if the system architecture is 32-bit.
      Returns:
      true if x86 (i.e., not x64), false otherwise.

    • isArm

      public static boolean isArm()
      Checks if the system architecture is ARM or AARCH.
      Returns:
      true if ARM-based architecture, false otherwise.

    • isWindowsSubsystemForLinux

      public static boolean isWindowsSubsystemForLinux()
      Checks if the current environment is WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux).
      Returns:
      true if running under WSL, false otherwise.

    • describe

      public static String describe()
      Returns a formatted string describing the current OS name, architecture, and version.
      Returns:
      a string with OS information.

    • getOsName

      public static String getOsName()
      Returns the name of the current operating system.
      Returns:
      the OS name.

      public static String getOsArch()
      Returns the architecture of the current operating system.
      Returns:
      the OS architecture.

    • getOsVersion

      public static String getOsVersion()
      Returns the version of the current operating system.
      Returns:
      the OS version.
